QuestData.Title: Where'd They Go?
QuestData.Description:
My boys are missing. You're going to help me find 'em.
Got it?
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate clues regarding the missing Roughnecks.
QuestData.RewardText: Pity. At least I can tell the rest of the boys they went down fighting.

Objectives.Objective: Find evidence of the missing Roughnecks
